Player - Class in game
The Player class contains a Board object, which the class uses to do the actions a real player would do in a game of Battleship.

R

rotateShip method is intended to be used is a game where the ships can move, which is no possible at the moment.
rotateShip() - Method in class game.Ship
rotateship() method changes the rotation of the ship from vertical to horizontal or from horizontal to vertical.
